title: Not My Job: Poet Billy Collins Takes A Quiz About Phil Collins
teaser: We've invited Billy Collins — who served as U.S. poet laureate from 2001 to 2003 — to play a game called, "I can feel it coming in the air tonight." Originally broadcast Nov. 1, 2013.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
